column1: Uchi////I'm a big fan of raw fish and the selection they had that night was from Japan's Toyosu Market. It was ALL phenomenal. A few of my favorites from the special was the Loup De Mer (Mediterranean Bass)
column4: and the Bluefin Otoro (Fatty Tuna). The taste of the Otoro was indescribable. Super fatty with every bite
column5: Super delicious. I enjoyed the Engawa (Flounder Fin Muscle) too because I enjoy the slightly torched taste. I wish I could write about all of the specials
column6: but then I'd be writing a book! Lol
column7: feel free to contact me for any requests!
